pullRequest.title: HDDS-3501. OzoneFileStatus should not extend FileStatus
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
FileStatus is a Hadoop specific class. The return type of getFileStatus OM call should be Hadoop independent and a simple POJO can be used.
OzoneFileSystem can create the appropriate FileStatus implementation based on the information in this simple POJO.

What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3501
How was this patch tested?
With full CI build on my fork.

commit.message: HDDS-3501. OzoneFileStatus should not extend FileStatus

nodes.bodyText: How do we plan to map the dir/dir permission into Ozone ACLs? It is currently hard coded to 777 for dir and 666 for file.
